title: Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail: Social Media
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Social Media              Social Media          Â    Tag Your Place on the #AnzaTrail Create a custom sign to show off your place on the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail. Post it with the hashtag #AnzaTrail or tag us @AnzaTrailNPS on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and more.  Create & download your sign here (requires Acrobat Reader): Letter Size (8.5" x 11") My Place on the #AnzaTrail (English) Mi Sitio en la #AnzaTrail (Spanish)   Tabloid Size (11" x 17") My Place on the #AnzaTrail (English) Mi Sitio en la #AnzaTrail (Spanish)
